subject: Commonwealth Games
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: On a soggy track following torrential rain, Usain Bolt gave the Commonwealth Games a display of showmanship and speed to anchor Jamaica’s 4x100-meter relay team to a gold medal at the Commonwealth Games in Glasgow.
snippet: On a soggy track following torrential rain, Usain Bolt gave the Commonwealth Games a display of showmanship and speed to anchor Jamaica’s 4x100-meter relay team to a gold medal at the Commonwealth Games in Glasgow.
